title: Keeper App
beforeContent: A simple note-taking app built with React JS, allowing users to add, remove, and delete notes. It offers a clean, responsive design and smooth performance for managing tasks and ideas.

title: Calculator
beforeContent: A Calculator developed in JS for evaluating mathematical expressions. It offers users a visually intuitive interface to perform arithmetic calculations efficiently.

title: Ecommerce Web
beforeContent: An e-commerce platform built with React, Context API, and React Toast. It features real-time product updates, a dynamic shopping cart, and smooth notifications for a seamless shopping experience.
